name: AniList
description: A GraphQL API for accessing a comprehensive database of anime and manga, including characters, staff, and airing data

about.overview: AniList API provides access to over 20,000 anime and 100,000 manga entries, powering AniList and AniChart with data on characters, staff, and airing schedules.

endpoints.description: Query anime details by ID or title

codeSnippets.javascript: fetch('https://graphql.anilist.co', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({ query: '{ Media(id: 1) { title { romaji } } }') }).then(res => res.json())
codeSnippets.python:
import requests
response = requests.post('https://graphql.anilist.co', json={'query': '{ Media(id: 1) { title { romaji } } }'})
codeSnippets.curl: curl -X POST https://graphql.anilist.co -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"query": "{ Media(id: 1) { title { romaji } } }"}'
